RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWIFT RITHMS pressed the pace two wide around the clubhouse turn, dropped back and shifted out four wide, came on again under left handed urging to make the lead neat the furlong marker and edged clear under strong handling. PLAYFUL SUMMER settled in the six path into the first turn, raced a wide trip, drifted out past the middle of the racetrack entering the stretch, closed willingly and got up for second. CHORIST with the second flight inside, offered a bid nearing the quarter pole, kept on inside rivals but was outfinished. SUSPICIOUS MINDS broke a step slow, loomed boldly three wide nearing the quarter pole, battled until deep stretch then was outfinished. LOVE'S TAVITO with the second flight between horses, steadied as the winner angled out at the half mile pole then lacked the needed response. HERO'S DAUGHTER set the pace into the stretch then gave way. FIONA hopped at the start and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Playful Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 6path, wide trip, closed willingly, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace upper stretch, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, middle move, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Love's Tavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, between horses, steadied 1/2 pole, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Swift Rithms
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, dropped back, came again 4 wide, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Suspicious Minds
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke step slow, loomed 1/4 pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Fiona
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, settled 5 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 5. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GAIL'S DANCER was hustled along to press the pace four then three wide, made the lead in upper stretch and proved best under left handed urging. BOOGIE BOOGEE never far back, loomed boldly four wide into the stretch in the eight path and finished second best. CARMEN OHIO unhurried early, swung wide and closed a gap late in the middle of the racetrack. CAT'S RHYTHM allowed to settle, found her best stride late in the six path. NORTHERN JOURNEY had speed from the start, offered a bid two wide into the stretch then came up empty. HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE dueled for the lead along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. BAY MAGIC was hustled along to contest the lead two wide into the turn and was through after a half. BEST OF YOU trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Explosive
ENTRY.OWNER: Huffman Candance M and Mascher Joel F
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Best of You
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Carmen Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Royer Family Stables LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Boogie Boogee
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly, 4 wide 8path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, middle move, 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Bay Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, battled 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Gail's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed 4-3wide, surged late, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 5. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AGAVE KID pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead, drifted out to the nine path and edged clear under right handed urging. OVERBEARING stalked the pace into the stretch, drifted to mid track and finished second best. THE DRAKE allowed to settle, swung wide and closed a gap late past the middle of the racetrack. KING ANDRES went evenly. TEN TWENTY NINE passed tiring rivals. LONTANI sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace near the inside into the stretch then weakened. SELLING OUT was no threat. YO BERBS broke a step slow, rushed to contention along the inside, had speed into the stretch then was used up. CHROMIUM was outrun. BUCKY showed little. AIRWAR was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Berbs
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, rushed to contention, saved ground, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Airwar
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Chromium
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lontani
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Twenty Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Selling Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: The Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, late gain past mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Bucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Agave Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, drifted mid track, edged clear, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Overbearing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drifted mid track, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 66. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHLOES ANGEL chased the pace into the stretch, surged four wide under left handed urging near mid track and proved best. BEAUTIFUL LASS raced outside, loomed boldly in the middle of the racetrack in upper stretch and finished second best. SEEKING THE MONEY sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace off the rail, drifted to the seven path entering the stretch then was outfinished. LATE DATE failed to menace. FAITHFUL SOLUTION allowed to settle, improved position along the inside into the far turn then came up empty. GIMME CLEARANCE was through after a half. SWEETER THAN HONEY was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Late Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Chloes Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, surged 4 wide, left handed urging, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Faithful Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweeter Than Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme Clearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking the Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace off rail, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip, loomed boldly upper stretch, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAN MAMIBELLA never far back, closed willingly four wide under left handed urging to make the lead on deep stretch and edged clear late. MOANA'S TALE never far back, rallied through the stretch five wide and finished clear for second. FREE TO RUN away alertly, set the pace into the turn, made strides until deep stretch then faded. MON PARADIS slow early, found her best stride late. CLIFTONS BALLERINA stalked the pace into the stretch, loomed boldly three wide before the furlong marker then failed to sustain that bid. AWESOME WONDER chased the pace into the turn, made the lead two wide, set the pace until deep stretch then weakened. DANCE ON OVER broke slowly and was no threat. BOUJEE KITTEN was no factor. LINDA LOVES LACE was outrun. TALK DIRTY was through after a half. TIMES PROVIDED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance On Over
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Linda Loves Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, left handed urging

ENTRY.NAME: Moana's Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 5 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Boujee Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Cliftons Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Paradis
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Free to Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace turn, dug in lane, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, led, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAXIMUM IMPACT trailed for a half, gained ground two wide through the far turn, shifted outside rivals at the top of the stretch, rallied four wide to make the lead near the furlong marker, shook clear and just lasted under a hand ride. CREDIT RIVER set the early going along the inside through the first turn, chased the pace, dropped back entering the stretch then came on again late along the rail and just missed. GRAND DEAL unhurried early, swung wide and closed a fap late in the middle of the racetrack. SNOWSCAPE allowed to settled, loomed boldly three wide nearing the quarter pole, battled until deep stretch then was outfinished. AGNELLO'S DREAM pressed the pace two wide through the first turn, took command, shook clear before a half, set the pace to the quarter pole then weakened. DUKE OF FENWAY close up early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Credit River
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead inside, dropped back, came again rail, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Fenway
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, led, shook clear, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Snowscape
ENTRY.OWNER: Nikkel, Kathryn M. and Robertson, Sanford R.
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, loomed boldly 3 wide 2nd turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Maximum Impact
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, gained 2 wide 2nd turn, shifted 4w, clear late, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain, mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIGZ TOO sped to a clear lead in hand, set all the pace unchallenged and won under brisk handling. GIANT CRITIC was hung four wide on the first turn, stalked the pace three wide, swung wide and was steadily gaining ground late in the middle of the racetrack. NOT YET CHARLIE allowed to settle, swung wide and had a mild late rally out past the middle of the racetrack. DISTORTED LIMITS settled inside and failed to menace. JUSTIN'S QUEST chased the winner two wide into the stretch then weakened. MOTAGALLY chased the winner near the inside and was through after a half. CANDY KINGDOM was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, mild rally past mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Motagally
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Justin's Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Giant Critic
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, stalked 3w, gaining late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Kingdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Trigz Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped clear, set pace, unchallenged, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEAM LEYENDECKER stalked the pace into the stretch, responded readily when set down, made the lead before the furlong marker and finished full of run in the middle of the racetrack to win going away. JEBIP unhurried early, dropped inside rivals and finished determinedly to be clear for second. RUN ROCKY was squeezed soon after the start, dropped back to trailed, swung wide then came on again late. CONDEMNATION moved up three wide through the turn then leveled off. COWTOWN BOSS broke in front, set the pace into the stretch, drifted to the middle of the racetrack then weakened. GIV'EM THE BIZ chased the pace into the stretch and weakened late. LONE BOY was through early. WILLIE JONES was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Willie Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Team Leyendecker
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, full of run mid track, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Condemnation
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC WinStar Farm LLC and Check Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Run Rocky
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed early, dropped back, swung wide, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Jebip
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, finished well inside, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowtown Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace upper stretch, weakened,
